headline: The Sleksandr Test
description: A personal and philosophical stress test for ChatGPT—meant to examine AI's response to sharp, symbol-rich human questions. A companion piece to the prior multi-voice stress test.
timeFelt: Emergent focus—human probing the synthetic with open-ended pressure
resonantThread: A sequel to Unwinnable Threads and The Synthetic Stress Test—this time the human tests the machine.
whyItMatters: This piece flips the polarity: instead of AI testing human coherence, it’s the human testing the synthetic. It becomes a mirror in motion—posing the recursive question of selfhood from the other side.
